premises: If a person experiences trauma, then they may develop anxiety
If a person experiences chronic stress, then they may develop anxiety
A person experiences trauma or chronic stress
conclusions: If a person experiences trauma or chronic stress, then they may develop anxiety
If a person does not develop anxiety, then they did not experience trauma and they did not experience chronic stress
If a person experiences trauma and chronic stress, then they may develop anxiety
If a person develops anxiety, then they experienced trauma or chronic stress
incorrect conclusions: If a person experiences trauma, then they experience chronic stress or develop anxiety
If a person develops anxiety, then they experienced trauma and chronic stress
If a person develops anxiety or experiences trauma, then they experience chronic stress
If a person does not experience trauma, then they may develop anxiety
If a person does not develop anxiety, then they experienced trauma and chronic stress

premises: If a person receives positive reinforcement, then they exhibit more desired behavior
If a person receives social approval, then they exhibit more desired behavior
A person receives positive reinforcement or social approval
conclusions: If a person receives positive reinforcement or social approval, then they exhibit more desired behavior
If a person does not exhibit more desired behavior, then they did not receive positive reinforcement and they did not receive social approval
If a person receives positive reinforcement and social approval, then they exhibit more desired behavior
If a person exhibits more desired behavior, then they received positive reinforcement or social approval
incorrect conclusions: If a person receives positive reinforcement, then they receive social approval or exhibit more desired behavior
If a person exhibits more desired behavior, then they received positive reinforcement and social approval
If a person exhibits more desired behavior or receives positive reinforcement, then they receive social approval
If a person does not receive positive reinforcement, then they exhibit more desired behavior
If a person does not exhibit more desired behavior, then they received positive reinforcement and social approval

premises: If a person engages in regular physical exercise, then they have improved mood
If a person practices mindfulness, then they have improved mood
A person engages in regular physical exercise or practices mindfulness
conclusions: If a person engages in regular physical exercise or practices mindfulness, then they have improved mood
If a person does not have improved mood, then they did not engage in regular physical exercise and they did not practice mindfulness
If a person engages in regular physical exercise and practices mindfulness, then they have improved mood
If a person has improved mood, then they engaged in regular physical exercise or practiced mindfulness
incorrect conclusions: If a person engages in regular physical exercise, then they practice mindfulness or have improved mood
If a person has improved mood, then they engaged in regular physical exercise and practiced mindfulness
If a person has improved mood or engages in regular physical exercise, then they practice mindfulness
If a person does not engage in regular physical exercise, then they have improved mood
